display_information.name: slashmeet
display_information.long_description:
Create a Google Meet meeting from Slack.  Usage:
/meet
/meet [meeting name]
/meet meeting_name start_time|now
/meet meeting_name start_time|now duration
/meet meeting_name start_time|now end time

Meeting name can be put in quotes if it contains a space.  It can contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, exclamation marks and dashes, eg "My super-special_meeting!"
Times can be in format hour:minute followed by am or pm, eg 12:34pm or 24 hour format eg 12:34.
Durations are an integer followed by h or m, eg 35m.
